item.title: Spaceballs Dancer
item.description: Those who remember the old Amiga demoscene might recall “State of the Art” by the Spaceballs. At the time this was ground breaking with a vectorised dancer moving around fullscreen with clipping. It was all but an MTV video with dance music and fast strobing visuals. As a member of some retro groups that regularly post youtube videos of them. After seeing it again I decided to have a go at recreating it.
